    Function reference

    All functions

    AFSD()
    Analysis of foci structure and dynamics (AFSD)
    BPL()
    Binary Power Law Analysis for Spatial Disease Patterns
    BlastWheat
    Wheat blast data in 143 field trials in Brazil
    BudBlightSoybean
    Bud blight of soybean
    CompMuCens()
    Survival analysis for quantitative ordinal scale data.
    DSI()
    Calculate the Disease Severity Index (DSI) (class for each unit)
    DSI2()
    Calculate the Disease severity Index (DSI) (frequency of each class)
    DidymellaWatermelon
    Spatial data on gummy stem blight of watermelon
    FHBWheat
    FHB collected at 153 fiels in Brazil
    FusariumBanana
    Fusarium Wilt on Bananas
    RustSoybean
    Soybean rust severity in Brazil
    SpatialAggregated
    Simulated aggregated spatial xy data
    SpatialRandom
    Simulated random spatial xy data
    WhiteMoldSoybean
    White mold on soybean in Brazil
    count_subarea()
    Count the number of ones (diseased plants) in subareas of a matrix
    doublets.test()
    Doublets Test
    fit_gradients()
    Fit Gradient Models to Data
    join_count()
    Test for Spatial Join Count Statistics
    oruns_test()
    Runs Test
    plot_AFSD()
    Plot ASFD
    theme_r4pde()
    Custom ggplot2 theme based on cowplot::theme_half_open
    windowpane()
    Sliding Window Analysis for Time-Series Data
